page.title: 09Playground Games. 2
page.content:
For{Gobble_Obble}you need 3 or more people. You have to have some lines marked out on a playground or field. You have to pick a place for your den near to the marked lines. One person is chosen to be "It". When everyone is in the den at the start of the game, somebody says "All pacmen on alert!" Then everyone has to get out of the den and run along the lines and back to their den. They must go to the end but dodge the person who is "It". If they catch you and say "Gobble_Obble" you are the next "It". If somebody is in trouble because the "It" has almost got them,they shout "Pacmates!", and the other people who are playing have to try and help by distracting the "It".
{This game is based on a very popular} {video game known as Pacman.}
